author: Dre Masso
description: A fruity, minty crowd pleasing Julep.
name: Mixed Berry Julep
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE berries in base of glass
Add mint, bourbon, cognac, and sugar syrup into glass, add crushed ice and CHURN (stir) with bar spoon
Top up the glass with more crushed ice and CHURN again
Repeat this process until the drink fills the glass and serve
